code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 39 yr old white male presents with mild abdominal pain, mild diarrhea. he has history of mild nausea. o:Height 68 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed prochlorperazine - 40 mg daily (oral dose), and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel.

s:a 40 YO white M coach c/o 3 days h/o mild cough (not checked), mild fever. NKDA. he is a chronic alcoholic Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 68 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, nose = no nasal congestion, wheeze-LU, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, all lung fields a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN nasal cannula, and ordered FEV1, FEV1/FVC, Pulse Oximetry.

s:a male aged 41 yrs presents with mild fever. he has history of mild cough. o:Height 68 in, Weight 205 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, nose = no nasal congestion, wheeze-LU, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, all lung fields a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN nasal cannula, and ordered Chest X-Ray.
